article_title: Cut Health Coverage Or Send Obamacare Cadillac Tax To Junkyard?

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: With 2018 coming up fast, companies large and small are retooling to cut health benefits so they skip the Cadillac tax.
